== Notes == 
'''Mage shops''' contain any variation of [[Mage]], [[Scribe]], [[Alchemist]], [[Herbalist]], and [[Fortune Teller]].
== Locations ==
[[Britain]](x2), [[Buccaneer's Den]], [[Jhelom]], [[Moonglow]](x5), [[Ocllo]], [[Serpent's Hold]], [[Skara Brae]](x2), [[Trinsic]], [[Vesper]](x2),

*Lesser [[Potions]]
*[[Reagents]]
